text: Livain anabamɨn ofa gamir gumaziba, Ikiavɨra Itir God, ian God, uan ingangarim damuasa me amɨsevezɨ, ingangarir kam iti, me Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ziamɨn gun gumazamizibav kɨmtɨ, God deragh me damuam. Eghtɨ gumazim igharazitav mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghtɨ, me an kotiam baragham. Kamaghɨn, me uaghan dɨkavigh danganir kamɨn mangɨ.
